articles.description: Weezer have delayed the release of their upcoming new album 'Van Weezer', as well as sharing a new song called 'Hero' in tribute to key workers
articles.content:
Weezer pay tribute to frontline workers in the video for new track ‘Hero’ watch it below.
The new clip comes as the band announced the delay of their upcoming album ‘Van Weezer’ due to the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.
